name: LANhome TECHnologies
description:
LANhome TECHnologies has been effectively serving the Minneapolis/St. Paul Metro area since 2002 in computer network consulting and support, specializing in managed services, cloud computing and mobile solutions. Utilizing cloud based information technology infrastructure and services alternatives, we provide cost savings to small business who require increased ROI, ease of use, high availability and cross device compatibility.
Our clients trust their technology to us simply because we align our interest with them; packages can be tailored to suit each area deemed 100% essential, without the unnecessary infrastructure, software requirements and costs of current systems. LANhome TECHnologies offers customers a single point of reference for all technology related fields; our partnerships with top quality providers makes it easy to effectively add tasks as business requires. As a Google and RingCentral Partner, LANhome TECHnologies brings with it the backing of premier names in the technology industry. This partnership enables us to ensure the data integrity, always-on availability, with better than 99.9% up-time and the access that is necessary for the data storage and communications departments within IT.
